description: Lists information about the managed permission and its associations to any resource shares that use this managed permission. This lets you see which resource shares use which versions of the specified managed permission.

parameters.name: defaultVersion
parameters.description: When true, specifies that you want to list only those associations with resource shares that use the default version of the specified managed permission. When false (the default value), lists associations with resource shares that use any version of the specified managed permission.

nested_items.name: permissions
nested_items.description: A structure with information about this customer managed permission.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the associated managed permission.

nested_items.name: permissionVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the permission currently associated with the resource share.

nested_items.name: defaultVersion
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the associated resource share is using the default version of the permission.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type to which this permission applies.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the association between the permission and the resource share. The following are the possible values:
ATTACHABLE --- This permission or version can be associated with resource shares.
UNATTACHABLE --- This permission or version can't currently be associated with resource shares.
DELETING --- This permission or version is in the process of being deleted.
DELETED --- This permission or version is deleted.

nested_items.name: featureSet
nested_items.description: Indicates what features are available for this resource share. This parameter can have one of the following values:

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the association between the permission and the resource share was last updated.

nested_items.name: resourceShareArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a resource share associated with this permission.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
